metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1297 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Out-of-bounds Read in r_bin_ne_get_entrypoints function in GitHub repository radareorg/radare2 prior to 5.6.8. This vulnerability may allow attackers to read sensitive information or cause a crash.

criterions.comment: radare2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
